alert.note: Alert for Greer; Jackson; Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 9:26PM CDT until May 04 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Granite, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hobart, Granite, Lone Wolf, Roosevelt and Altus-Lugert Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
